quote: If something is too complex to understand, it must be wrong
author: Arjen Poutsma

quote: Make It Work, Make It Right, Make It Fast
author: Kent Beck

quote: Leave the campground cleaner that you found it
author: Robert C. Martin

quote: Favor continuous improvement over delayed perfection
Tests should be fast, reliable and independent
Your solution should not be more complicated than the problem
One change at a time, one feature at a time
Write code that humans can easily understand
author: Martin Fowler

quote: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live
author: John Woods
